Quality Control (QA/QC) Engineer for Civil
Objective; Aspiring a career in a growth oriented organization to utilize
acquired  skills  &knowledge  in  achieving  organizational  goals,  while
attaining personal & professional growth. 
Professional with above one year of Relevant Experience
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Worked with P&C Projects Private Limited, Coimbatore, India
as a Quality Control/Quality Assurance  (QA/QC) Engineer for
Civil, From June’ 2016  to June’ 2017
Worked experience with (QA/QC) Inspector/Engineer for site 
Building works
Worked experience with QC Inspector/Engineer for Ready Mix 
Concrete Plant
Nature of Jobs & Responsibilities:
Preparing check list for the reinforcement by structure of the building.
After  preparing  check  list  to  call  clients  for  once  again  checking  by
reinforcement on site. 
Preparing design mix for the concrete by using concrete materials
Day  to  day  checking  moisture  content  for  coarse  aggregate  and  fine
aggregate by using micro oven
At concrete time to be call plant operator by preparing or batching for
concrete 
After  batching  of  concrete  to  be  checking  for  slump  test  for  suitable
structure of the building
After checking slump test to will doing for cube casting for concrete by IS
code specification
Take  own  charge  for  curing  by  concrete  structure  of  the  building  in
recommended days of curing by suitable structure of the building
Reinforcement will be checking by used to structural drawings
Casting cubes are after will doing for putting in to water by curing in 7days
and 28 days
After 7 & 28th days cubes are testing by compression testing machine (CTM)
For recommended specification quality control laboratory tests are doing by
client satisfaction
Collecting and controlling by concrete batching report, design mix result,
cube test result, other test results and documents  are keeping in to QC
Engineer-in-charge 
Controlled by formwork (shuttering) for building structure 
Cube tests are doing from site laboratory and outer laboratory (third party)
Day to day reporting for worked process to my site manager
